==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=师妹}}

===Etymology===
A compound of {{m|zh|師||teacher}} and {{m|zh|妹||younger sister}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=shīmèi
|c=si1 mui2
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[junior]] [[female]] [[fellow]] [[apprentice]]
# [[daughter]] of one's [[master]] younger than oneself
# [[father]]'s female apprentice younger than oneself
